alert.note: Alert for Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 3:24PM EDT until July 23 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Robeson County in southeastern North Carolina... Dillon County in northeastern South Carolina... Northeastern Darlington County in northeastern South Carolina... North central Marion County in northeastern South Carolina... Marlboro County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 323 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cheraw State Park, or near Cheraw, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Bennettsville, Dillon, Mccoll, Latta, Rowland, Clio, Sellers, Raemon, Hamer, Mont Clare, Brownsville, Oak Grove, South Of The Border, Wallace, Bingham, Chavistown, Dunbar, Little Rock, Minturn and Purvis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
